schema.name: qweather_weather_now
schema.description: Retrieve current weather information for a specific location using QWeather API. This can be used to get real-time weather details such as temperature, humidity, and weather conditions.

location.description: The location ID or coordinates (longitude,latitude) for which to retrieve the current weather. This ID is typically obtained from a city lookup API. For example, location=101010100 or location=116.41,39.92

lang.description: Language setting for the response. Based on the language used by the user. Default is zh-hans

unit.description: Unit of measurement for the response data. Options include unit=m (metric units, default) and unit=i (imperial units). Default is m
